thread.title: The Green World Given by Fosjoas Balancing Electric Unicycle V9
thread.title_full: The Green World Given by Fosjoas Balancing Electric Unicycle V9

title: The Green World Given by Fosjoas Balancing Electric Unicycle V9
text: The Green World Given by Fosjoas Balancing Electric Unicycle V9 Green riding is not just a slogan, it is the awareness the more and more people realize, with the combination of environment protection, Fosjoas electric scooter V9 amazed the public on its debut. For short, what the environmentally friendly and multi-function self-balancing scooter brings to people is more than expectation. China, 10 October 2015 -- Environment protection has been the world’s eye-catching issue, even the improvement of society should put environment in the important place. To respond for this call enthusiastically, developers apply the environment friendly idea in Fosjoas two wheel self-balancing scooter V9, so that the scooter gets the reputation of green high-tech product. Generally speaking, the Fosjoas electric scooter V9 is the vehicle with no-emission, so it reduces the tail gas pollution from the source. The power is offered by the maglev motor mounted on Fosjoas V9, with the improvement, the motor itself is much smaller than normal ones, besides, it is super quiet, at the aspect of environment protection, it does make great contributions to noise pollution reduction. For the old saying “Every coin has two sides”, people may think the function of Fosjoas self-balancing scooter V9 is not strong enough, however, the Fosjoas V9 gives amazing answer. The battery installed in Fosjoas two wheel electric scooter is Japan-made Lithium-ion battery core, which has much longer lifespan and the service time and can be rechargeable for 3000-4000 times.Apart from its high performance, the safety itself gets popular approval, with features of no-burning and no-exploding, it rules out people’s worry thoroughly. What’s more, the charging time is much shorter for 180 minutes for 520Wh with the fast charger. The max speed of Fosjoas V9 reaches 18km/h, while, to prevent injuries caused by speeding, the protecting measures will be done at different periods, for example, if the speed exceeds 16km/h, the front end of pedal will rise gradually, and the pedal will pose a 10°angle to the leveling surface, which stop riders inclining further to accelerate. Travel green is the healthy travel way for riders. When people enjoy the beautiful landscape given by nature, they should maintain its original appearance. What Fosjoas self-balancing scooter V9 focuses is not only improvement of technology, but also of views and values of people, the green world need to be protected by everyone. # # #
